name: World End Syndrome: Another Summer (Hanako)
description:
World End Syndrome: Another Summer was a fangame idea the Discord Server for World End Syndrome had to keep the town of Mihate Town alive. However, as a team we only ever did the writing for the fangame and nothing else. I decided that rather than letting that writing go to waste, I would use it in a smaller-scale type of project.  

World End Syndrome: Another Summer is a non-canon addition to the World End Syndrome world. WES: AS is filled with different scenarios featuring each character. WES: AS (Hanako) only features scenarios involving Hanako Yamada (which only involves 1 since only 1 scenario was written up at the time). 

In the future, I plan to release the other scenarios, so think of WES: AS (Hanako) as episode 1 in a series of 5. Also, these scenarios are not that long, so think of them as visual novellas rather than full-length novels. 

(Discord Server link for those who are interested in joining the World End Syndrome community: https://discord.gg/2Xwt7m2ect).
